thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Comoros captain Nadjim Abdou to miss Ghana clash in 2018 World Cup qualifiers
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Comoros captain Nadjim Abdou to miss Ghana clash in 2018 World Cup qualifiers

title: EXCLUSIVE: Comoros captain Nadjim Abdou to miss Ghana clash in 2018 World Cup qualifiers
text:
Sports News | 23 October 2015 11:25 CET EXCLUSIVE: Comoros captain Nadjim Abdou to miss Ghana clash in 2018 World Cup qualifiers - www.ghanasoccernet.com Nadjim Abdou 
Comoros Islands have suffered a huge injury blow ahead of next month's 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers against Ghana with captain Nadjim Abdou ruled out. 
Abdou, who plays for English side Millwall, is facing a two-month spell on the sidelines. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
